magpie.analytics.utility

Class RobustRegressionUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.analytics.utility.RobustRegressionUtility

  • public class RobustRegressionUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    Calculates statistics useful to robust regression. Can perform the following operations when provided Dataset that contains both measured and predicted class variables.
    • Report the Robust Standard Deviation of Residuals
    • Determine which entries are outliers
    • Calculate the robust mean and standard deviation in absolute error.

    Uses methods outlined in a paper by Motulsky and Brown.

    .

    • Field Detail

      • Q

        protected double Q
        Threshold for considering an entry an outlier. Expressed as a desired false discovery rate. See paper by Benjamini and Hochberg

      • TestFraction

        protected double TestFraction
        What fraction of the population to test

                  int K)

        Parameters:

      • getRSDR

        public double getRSDR(double[] errors,
             int K)
        Calculate the Robust Standard Deviation of Residuals. Follows the method described in .

        NOTE: Their method seems to assume that the mean of residuals is 0, which is likely for most functions. I remove this constraint by subtracting the mean absolute error from the error of each point. This should not change results much. Motulsky and Brown

        Parameters:
        errors - Errors for entire population (not magnitude of errors).
        K - Number of fitted parameters in the model
        Returns:
        Robust Standard Deviation of Residuals

      • getRSDR

        public double getRSDR(double[] errors,
             double mean,
             int K)
        Calculate RSDR if the mean is already known. See getRSDR(double[], int) for more details.
        Parameters:
        errors - Errors for entire population (not magnitude of errors).
        K - Number of fitted parameters in the model
        mean - Mean error
        Returns:
        Robust Standard Deviation of Residuals
